text: The 1993–94 Sporting de Gijón season was the 32nd season of the club in La Liga, the 18th consecutive after its last promotion. ==Overview== On 16 January 1994, in a rainy evening, Real Sporting defeated Osasuna by 7–1, becoming its largest win in La Liga ever. Xavier Escaich scored four goals. == Squad == ==Competitions== ===La Liga=== ==== Results by round ==== ====League table==== ====Matches==== ===Copa del Rey=== ====Matches==== ==Squad statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |} ==References== ==External links== *Profile at BDFutbol *Official website 1993-94 Sporting de Gijon
title: 1993–94 Sporting de Gijón season
